meanings.definition: The quality or state of being orderly.
meanings.sent1: Her room's orderlinesses made it easy to find things.
meanings.sent2: The orderlinesses of the shelves in the store impressed the customers.
meanings.sent3: The orderlinesses of the alphabet soup letters spelled out a secret message.
meanings.sent4: The orderlinesses of the ants marching in a line fascinated the children.
meanings.sent5: The orderlinesses of the colored pencils in the box created a beautiful pattern.

meanings.definition: The arrangement or disposition of things in a neat or organized manner.
meanings.sent1: The orderlinesses of the books on the shelf made it easy to locate the one she needed.
meanings.sent2: The orderlinesses of the files in the cabinet helped streamline the workflow.
meanings.sent3: The orderlinesses of the toys in the playroom made it look like a mini toy store.
meanings.sent4: The orderlinesses of the flowers in the garden resembled a carefully planned painting.
meanings.sent5: The orderlinesses of the ingredients on the kitchen counter inspired her to bake a cake.
